latex:
Each integer $1$ through $9$ is written on a separate slip of paper and all nine slips are put into a hat.  Jack picks one of these slips at random and puts it back.  Then Jill picks a slip at random.  Which digit is most likely to be the units digit of the \textbf{sum} of Jack's integer and Jill's integer?\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ 0\qquad\textbf{(B)}\ 1\qquad\textbf{(C)}\ 8\qquad\textbf{(D)}\ 9\qquad\textbf{(E)}\ \text{each digit is equally likely} $
